item.title: RuneStream's Range Master
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

[quote=“Miss Silabsoft, post:5, topic:191271”]for the love of god learn some basic data management. hell use a plain text data file if thats easier for you to comprehend.

lets look at some of the epic failures in this thread… number 1:

	class5.anIntArray94 = new int[3];
	class5.anIntArray94[0] = 1235; // npc
	class5.anIntArray94[1] = 5; // npc
	class5.anIntArray94[2] = 1234; // npc

if your still going to hard code it why not be alittle less retarded and create the array all in 1 move

class5.anIntArray94 = new int{1235,5,1234};

not that i would recommend doing that but hey you just saved yourself 3 moronic lines good game.

here is some links to help you because you desperately need it my friend

JavaWorld

Java performance programming, Part 1: Smart object-management saves the day

Excessive object creation can be a huge problem in Java programs. Despite continuing improvements in JVM technology for memory management, the object creation and garbage collection cycle is still a very expensive operation. If frequently used code...


http://www.cafeconleche.org/books/xmljava/chapters/[/quote]
Wow no one cares?Stop trying to be a smart arse.It still works,so who gives a shit.

Read full topic

item.title: RuneStream's Range Master
item.dc:creator: @Khasck Khasck
item.description:
@Khasck wrote:

Hello. This Tutorial Is Made By Mod Jamie.

Diffculty: 7/10
Server And Client Side If You Want RuneStream Effects

NoteYou Must Know How To Add Models

Ok First Go in To NPChandler

Add This Too Your Npc Attacks

                   if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 12) {
                        GraphicsHandler.createProjectile(426, npcs[NPCID].absY,
                                npcs[NPCID].absX, offsetY, offsetX, 50, 95, 249,
                                30, 30, EnemyIndexP + 1, 250, EnemyY, EnemyX, 0);
                        if (server.playerHandler.players[Player].playerEquipment[server.playerHandler.players[Player].playerShield]
                                == 426) {
                            hitDiff = misc.random(10);
                            MageEmote = 426; // barrages
                            server.playerHandler.players[Player].hitDiff = hitDiff;
                            server.playerHandler.players[Player].updateRequired = true;
                            server.playerHandler.players[Player].hitUpdateRequired = true;
                            server.playerHandler.players[Player].appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
                        } else {
                            hitDiff = misc.random(30);
                            MageEmote = 426; // Karil's shooting emote
                            server.playerHandler.players[Player].hitDiff = hitDiff;
                            server.playerHandler.players[Player].updateRequired = true;
                            server.playerHandler.players[Player].hitUpdateRequired = true;
                            server.playerHandler.players[Player].appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
                        }
                    }

Next Add This Too Your Class5

if(i == 12){
	class5.aStringArray66 = new String[5];
	class5.aStringArray66[1] = "Attack";

	class5.anIntArray76 = new int[0];
	class5.anIntArray70 = new int[0];

	class5.anIntArray94 = new int[3];
	class5.anIntArray94[0] = 1235; // npc
	class5.anIntArray94[1] = 5; // npc
	class5.anIntArray94[2] = 1234; // npc

	class5.anInt61 = 138; // Level
	class5.aString65 = "Dodain";
	class5.aByteArray89 = "Master of Range".getBytes();
	}

Then Add Both Models.
Then Log On Server And Type Add Model 1234.
Then Type add model 1235.
Close Out Both Server And Client And Complie

Thanks, Mod Jamie
Post All Errors

Pictures

Attacking Picture

Just A Picture Of The Npc

Another Attacking Picture

Read full topic
